body: In Windows, static libraries are generated if you want to expose some functions or classes in C++. So in order to build THNN/THCUNN, you 'll need this external link to torch._C. But the path of the build dir is only known when the build function is called. At that time, THNN/THCUNN is already defined. So the `global` is used here to append the extra link arguments.
